fullplot: The little nomad girl Nansal finds a baby dog in the mongolian veld, who becomes her best friend - against all rejections of her parents. Only as the little dog, Zocher, saves the life of the youngest son, father and mother finally see his good soul. A story about a mongolian family of nomads - their traditional way of life and the rising call of the City.

title: The Cave of the Yellow Dog

tomatoes.consensus: A sparse, hauntingly beautiful journey across continents and cultures.

writers: Abel Cantou (english adaptation: original version with subtitles)
